mapper.select:
SELECT n.id,n.alarmid,n.userid,n.status,n.alarmtime,n.confirmtime,n.name,n.describes,s.name AS systemname,u.name AS username FROM news n LEFT JOIN user u ON n.userid = u.id LEFT JOIN alarm a ON n.alarmid = a.id LEFT JOIN device d ON a.deviceid = d.id LEFT JOIN devicegroup dg ON d.groupid = dg.id LEFT JOIN room r ON dg.roomid = r.id LEFT JOIN location l ON r.locationid = l.id LEFT JOIN system s ON l.systemid = s.id
AND userid = '${userId}' AND alarmtime > '${startTime}' AND alarmtime < '${endTime}' AND status = '${status}' AND s.id = '${systemId}'
ORDER BY alarmtime DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET userid = ${userId}, status = 1, confirmtime = now() WHERE id = ${newsId}
